SELECT E.EMP_NO ,E.NICK ,R.RANK_NAME ,D.DEPT_NAME ,E.PHONE ,E.EMAIL ,E.STATUS FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO INNER JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE E.STATUS = 'Y'
AND NICK LIKE
AND RANK_NAME LIKE
AND DEPT_NAME LIKE
AND PHONE LIKE
AND EMAIL LIKE
'%${keyword}%'

SELECT E.EMP_NO ,E.NICK ,R.RANK_NAME ,D.DEPT_NAME ,E.PHONE ,E.EMAIL ,E.ADDRESS ,TO_CHAR(E.HIRE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HIRE_DATE ,E.STATUS FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO INNER JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO WHERE E.STATUS = 'Y'
